text: Gianni Iorio (born March 9, 1972), is an Italian bandoneón player who performs all over the world.YouTube EBS TV Korea. Milonga de mis amores G. Iorio and P. Stafano. Retrieved 3 September 2016 .Corato Piano Festival. Strumenti e Musica. Retrieved 3 September 2016 . ==Discography== * Astor's Mood (Realsound 2002) * A night in Vienna for Astor Piazzolla "Live Album" (Philology 2005) * Tango Mediterraneo (Jazzhaus Records 2008) * D'impulso (Jazzhaus Records 2011) * Nocturno (Enja Records 2016) ==References== Category:Italian musicians Category:Tango musicians Category:Bandoneonists Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:People from Foggia
title: Gianni Iorio
